scripts.dev: bun run build && concurrently "cd packages/notivue && bun run watch" "bun install && cd demo && bun run dev --host"
scripts.preview: bun run build && bun install && cd demo && bun run preview
scripts.build:demo: bun run build && bun install && cd demo && bun run build
scripts.test: bun run build && bun install && cd tests && bun run test
scripts.test:gui: bun run build && concurrently "cd packages/notivue && bun run watch" "bun install && cd tests && bun run test:gui"
